# AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.pause

**Case**

The player should pause playing.

## Declaration

```swift
case pause
```

## Actions

- **AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.advance**: The player should advance to the next item, if there is one.
- **AVPlayer.ActionAtItemEnd.none**: The player should do nothing.

items.description: The player should advance to the next item, if there is one.
